property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: correctValues
property.value: {"Global Entities:", "{ cat: { name: cat }, bird: { name: bird }, dog: { name: dog }, fish: { name: fish }, walrus: { name: walrus }, salmon: { name: salmon }, mammal: { name: mammal } }", "Zebra is an unregistered entity", "Attempting to alias cat as itself (should print false)", "false", "Attempting to alias cat as mammal (should print true)", "true", "Attempting to alias cat as mammal again (should print false)", "false", "Printing cat's aliases (should just be mammal)", "{ mammal: true }", "Giving mammal aliases with cat, bird, dog, fish, walrus, salmon, and mammal.", "{ cat: true, bird: true, dog: true, fish: true, walrus: true, salmon: true }", "Printing global repo as JSON", "{\"maps\":{},\"coordinateTransformations\":{},\"entities\":{\"cat\":{\"name\":\"cat\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{\"mammal\":true},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"bird\":{\"name\":\"bird\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"dog\":{\"name\":\"dog\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"fish\":{\"name\":\"fish\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"walrus\":{\"name\":\"walrus\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"salmon\":{\"name\":\"salmon\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}},\"mammal\":{\"name\":\"mammal\",\"containingMap\":null,\"aliases\":{\"cat\":true,\"bird\":true,\"dog\":true,\"fish\":true,\"walrus\":true,\"salmon\":true},\"placements\":{},\"occupancies\":{}}}}"}
